snippet: After watching a video in which the media mogul used obscenities to refer to the former lover who filed the suit, Judge David Cowan suggested he had seen enough.
abstract: Superior Court Judge David J Cowan says he is considering dismissing mental competency lawsuit against Viacom and CBS executive Sumner M Redstone after viewing videotaped testimony by him; in video, Redstone forcefully rejects proposal that former companion Manuela Herzer make his health care decisions.

byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY and EMILY STEEL
byline.contributor: Michael Cieply reported from Los Angeles and Emily Steel from New York.

lead_paragraph: After watching a video in which the media mogul used obscenities to refer to the former lover who filed the suit, Judge David Cowan suggested he had seen enough.

headline.main: Judge in Sumner Redstone Trial Says He’s Leaning Toward Dismissal
headline.print_headline: Judge Weighs Dismissing Case After Fiery Video of Redstone

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Living Wills and Health Care Proxies
